creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
Jörn reported this in http://marc.info/?t=117796131400110&r=1&w=2 and I now have
seen it myself lots of time. It is critical that we find the root cause.

One possible solution was recommended in above thread from Antonio 
"Also please try to update java to 1.5.0_11"

Since I switched to 1.5.0_11 I did not see this issue anymore.

Will wait some more days before closing this bug.
creator: thorsten@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text: i wonder what the best place for a warning to our users might be... INSTALL-SRC?

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
i haven't seen the problem in a while. my current version is
java-1_5_0-sun-devel-1.5.0_update12-3.1.
i'll commit a warning to INSTALL-SRC and close the bug.
